definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Previous research on the definite article has been conventionally confined to the sentential level of language.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的英語定冠詞研究是在句子的層面上進行的。

sentences.english: But I suppose I became interested in taking the carving to another level.
sentences.chinese: 但是我覺得我對雕刻的愛好上升到了另一層面。

sentences.english: This is the noumenon affirmation of the historical law.
sentences.chinese: 這是在本體論層面對歷史規律存在的肯定。

sentences.english: This article is the research ofluoshan puppet from cultural aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文是從文化學的層面對羅山皮影戲進行研究。

sentences.english: One chooses one thing over another and people always think 'there could have been a better way'.
sentences.chinese: 張頤武認爲，青春更多的是一個精神層面上的概念。

sentences.english: This section gives a high-level overview on the implementation of the procedures discussed so far in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本節在較高的層面上概述本文前面討論的過程的實現。

sentences.english: The government said the agenda will be set through existing working-level contacts.
sentences.chinese: 政府表示將通過工作層面的接觸制定議程。

sentences.english: Emancipating the mind and run through the infiltration of socialism with Chinese characteristics in all levels.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想貫穿於滲透於中國特色社會主義的各個層面。

sentences.english: But there was another layer, designed for the people in the ministries.
sentences.chinese: 但演說還有另一層面，是說給部長和大臣們聽的。

sentences.english: Fourth, the traditional social philosophy is pluralistic in its values.
sentences.chinese: 傳統處世哲學在價值層面呈現著多元取向。

sentences.english: Different kinds of right to resist have different meanings.
sentences.chinese: 不同層面的抵抗權有不同的含義。

sentences.english: Imperium has its territorial basis and non-territorial implications.
sentences.chinese: 帝權以領土爲基礎，同時又有非領土層面的含義。

sentences.english: Moreover govt is doing nothing for the growth of micro level industries.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，政府沒有爲微觀層面行業做任何事。

sentences.english: The brand of product has two kinds of nature:function nature and emotion nature.
sentences.chinese: 產品品牌具有功能屬性和情感屬性兩個層面。

sentences.english: On one level, this is not surprising.
sentences.chinese: 從某種層面上來講這毫不足奇。

sentences.english: But I think we can only do it in a rudimentary sort of way.
sentences.chinese: 但我想我們現在只能在基本層面上了解大腦。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
